meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the Haggadah.
meanings.sent1: The haggadic story in the book was full of interesting characters.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the haggadic tales told during the holiday celebrations.
meanings.sent3: The haggadic twist at the end of the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His haggadic imagination painted vivid pictures in the minds of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The haggadic details in the narrative made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Of or pertaining to the non-legal or narrative portions of rabbinical literature.
meanings.sent1: The haggadic teachings provided moral lessons for the community.
meanings.sent2: Students were captivated by the haggadic stories shared by the rabbi.
meanings.sent3: The haggadic anecdotes added a touch of humor to the serious text.
meanings.sent4: Her haggadic interpretations shed new light on the ancient texts.
meanings.sent5: The haggadic passages were like colorful threads woven into the fabric of the religious texts.
